data.description: As a Software Developer Intern at Nokia, you’ll gain hands‑on experience shaping the future of technology by working on real‑world projects that impact how people connect worldwide. In this role, you’ll analyze functional specifications, design system architecture, write and validate code, and participate in system integration testing, all while collaborating with talented engineers. It’s an opportunity to sharpen your technical expertise, contribute to meaningful innovations, and see your work come to life in solutions used across the globe.
